page.title: 17Religion in Grundisburgh
page.content:
Within the village of Grundisburgh the Christian faith is accommodated by the parish church of St. Mary's; (Church of England/Anglican - Ave.Att.100); and a Chapel; (Baptist - Ave.Att.20). Both provide a Sunday School. Other Christian persuasions are accommodated in the nearby towns of Woodbridge (5 kms) and Ipswich (10 kms).
Jewish synagogue at Colchester (40 kms)
Information regarding the accommodation of other faiths is not available.
Religious Education within the terms of the 1944 Education Act is provided by the curriculum of Grundisburgh County Primary School.
